participant_1.background:
I have light brown hair that I usually wear in a ponytail.
My parents are loving and supportive, even if they don't always understand my choices.
i love to take road trips.
I am a freelancer because I can choose my own hours and work from anywhere.
i am good at throwing parties.

participant_2.background:
I love making short films with my camcorder.
I once dressed up as a superhero and told the police officer that I was on my way to save the world.
I like to stay active and go to the gym 3-4 times a week.
i graduated high school.
my favorite type of music is metal.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! I'm a freelancer and I love being able to choose my own hours.
That sounds like a great job! I work as a video editor and I love making short films.
Oh that's awesome! Do you have a favorite film that you've made?
I do! I made a short film about a superhero who saves the world.
That sounds really cool! I'd love to see it if you have a copy.
Sure, I can send it to you.
Thanks! I'm really looking forward to seeing it.
No problem! I'm glad you're interested.
Are you a fan of metal music?
Yes, I love metal music! My favorite band is Metallica.
That's awesome! I love Metallica too. They're one of my favorite bands.
Cool! I'm glad you like them too.
Me too! They're a great band.
